text.p: Suppose you do some row operations to an augmented matrix, and the result is the following augmented matrix:
How many free variables are there?
What can you conclude about the original system of equations?

choice.text: The system is consistent and has a unique solution
The system is consistent but has more than one solution

font.p: The original system corresponds to 3 equations in 2 variables. Since there are two pivot positions in the RREF and 2 variables, we can conclude that there are [mathjaxinline]2-2=0[/mathjaxinline] free variables. Thus, the original system is consistent and has a unique solution.
